alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT ESCAMBIA...NORTHERN SANTA ROSA AND NORTH CENTRAL ESCAMBIA COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM CDT... At 444 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Riverview, or 5 miles south of Brewton, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Brewton, Century, Flomaton, East Brewton, Jay, Pollard, and Riverview. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
